# displayName

**Instance Property**

The name that the system uses when displaying the workout.

## Declaration

```swift
var displayName: String?
```

## Accessing workout data

- **activities**: An ordered list of activities for the multisport workout.

items.description: An ordered list of activities for the multisport workout.
items.name: activities
